summary: SummaryMediheal's Vitamin C Pore Toning Cleanser improves skin clarity and radiance while toning pores, delivering a revitalizing cleanse that leaves skin plump, soft, and energized.
details: DetailsBenefitsBrightens dull skin and evens tone with pore-deep cleansing, promoting clearer, more radiant skin with daily use and leaving a fresh, residue-free finish.Completed a skin irritation test for sensitive skin and certified by Germany Dermatest, this mildly alkaline formula features a fresh citrus scent.With a dense whipped-cream foam, it gently deep cleanses using fine, tightly packed micro-bubbles.Key IngredientsVitamin C Liposome - Helps brighten skin and enhance vitalityTriple Hyaluronic Acid - Hydrates and plumps the skinPapain - Gently exfoliates and improves skin texture / protein-degrading enzymeResearch ResultsSkin firmness improvement: +102.88% after useImmediate skin texture improvement: +105.56% after useReduction in blackheads & whiteheads after use: 111.21% decrease after useItem 2648312How To UseAdd water to create a creamy foam, gently massage onto the face, then rinse. Suitable for daily facial cleansing.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Palm Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Potassium Cocoate, Glyceryl Stearate, Polyquaternium-7, Fragrance(Parfum), Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Benzoate, Betaine, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Papain, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Cholesterol, Chitosan, Ascorbic Acid, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Ceramide NP.
how_to_use: Add water to create a creamy foam, gently massage onto the face, then rinse. Suitable for daily facial cleansing.
